Nice, fyi to everyone VLC player is not your only choice. It is so so simple with smplayer. All you have to do is open the avi with smplayer, then goto Audio->Load External File->Select the mp3 audio "soundtrack" is the filename, and smplayer automatically syncs it up, and it has a ton of other great features, check it out http://smplayer.sourceforge.net/downloads.php?tr_lang=en

Also smplayer remembers every setting for each individual video. What does that mean for this torrent? Well after you do the process of loading the audio into this video, even though smplayer makes it real simple, you never have to do it again. Because the next time you open the avi with smplayer it will remember that it was loaded with the english audio mp3 file, and it will load the audio with it every time you open it, even a year from now. Awesome.
